analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/15/0xe557c06e5fc9beeb9a7cab3ec8c20663c1420659.sol:
	Contract FixedSupplyToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/15/0xe557c06e5fc9beeb9a7cab3ec8c20663c1420659.sol#221)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/15/0xe557c06e5fc9beeb9a7cab3ec8c20663c1420659.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/15/0xe557c06e5fc9beeb9a7cab3ec8c20663c1420659.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/15/0xe557c06e5fc9beeb9a7cab3ec8c20663c1420659.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
